Nsukka Group bụ aha e nyere otu ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria jikọtara na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka.

A maara ndị otu Nsukka maka ịrụ ọrụ iji mee ka omume nke uli dị ọhụrụ ma tinye atụmatụ ya n'ime nka nke oge a site na iji mgbasa ozi dịka acrylic paint, tempera, gouache, pen na ink, pastel, oil paint, na watercolor
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị na-ese ihe na uli bụ ụmụ nwanyị, ọtụtụ n'ime ndị na-ese ihe nke otu ahụ bụ ụmụ nwoke
Ụfọdụ bụ ndị na-ede uri ebe ndị ọzọ bu ndị edemede na mgbakwunye ịbụ ndị na-ese ihe.
Ndị otu Nsukka gbanwere dị ka omume nke enwere ike ịhụ na ọrụ ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe n'Afrịka
Ọ na-ekpughekarị onwe ya ngwakọta mbụ nke cubism na nka oge ochie.

N'ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 1997, National Museum of African Art nke Smithsonian Institution malitere ihe ngosi The Poetics of the Line: Seven Artists of the Nsukka Group, nke bụkwa ihe ngosi mmeghe nke Sylvia H
